metadata.title: CVE-2021-46244 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description: A Divide By Zero vulnerability exists in HDF5 v1.13.1-1 vis the functionH5T__complete_copy () at /hdf5/src/H5T.c. This vulnerability causes anaritmetic exception, leading to a Denial of Service (DoS).

criterions.comment: hdf5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
